title: Media keys not working with LoL
body: I have the Razer blackwidow chroma, I use itunes and set up the keyboard to change song/pause, with the M1-3 keys. they no long seem to work whenever LoL is in focus, be it in game (windowed borderless) or just on the landing page, it works perfectly fine with every other game. The FN+F6 option no longer works either, friend of mine can still use these keys, and I have updated everything to the latest versions, Anyone have a solution to this?

replies.body:
I've fixed mine using a simple AHK script that activates windows taskbar for the key-press and instantly activates league of legends window after that. It's barely noticable in borderless fullscreen mode. Here you go;

__#__IfWinActive, League of Legends (TM) Client

Media_Next::
WinActivate, ahk_class Shell_TrayWnd
Send, {Media_Next}
WinActivate, League of Legends (TM) Client
return

Media_Play_Pause::
WinActivate, ahk_class Shell_TrayWnd
Send, {Media_Play_Pause}
WinActivate, League of Legends (TM) Client
return

Media_Prev::
WinActivate, ahk_class Shell_TrayWnd
Send, {Media_Prev}
WinActivate, League of Legends (TM) Client
return

I've heard of some settings inside Razer Synapse (the program that comes with the keyboard to control lights/keybindings) that could create profiles for specific games. To test if you have profiles that are causing issues, **close out Razer Synapse entirely** and hop into a custom game. If your media keys work now, you'll want to go back into Synapse to see what kind of profile or gaming settings may be enabled that would change your functions in a game of League. 

Let me know what changes.
